entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 12:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: NE 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 80. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
